docs.text: Cherokee Language Lessons 1 ¶ Printable Flashcards ¶ Flash cards by chapter can be found here: Flash Cards Audio Exercises ¶ Visit the following URL or search YouTube for “Cherokee Language CLL 1” and visit the channel to access the audio playlist. You specifically want the CLL 1 playlist. URL: https://bit.ly/3osnKOO Matching audio is also provided in downloadable MP3 format at CherokeeLessons.com. Visit the following URL. URL: https://bit.ly/3z1IpOK
